question1.question: What are your accepted payment methods?
question1.answer: We accept payments by credit card (Visa, MasterCard, American Express), PayPal and bank transfer.

question2.question: Do you offer international delivery?
question2.answer: Yes, we offer international shipping to many countries. Shipping costs vary depending on destination and item weight. You can check availability in your country during the ordering process

question3.question: What is your return policy?
question3.answer: We offer a 30 day return policy. If you are not completely satisfied with your purchase, you may return it to us in its original condition for a refund or exchange. Please see our returns policy page for more details.

question4.question: How can I track my order?
question4.answer: Once your order has been shipped, you will receive a confirmation email containing a tracking number. You can use this number to track the shipment of your order on the carrier's website.

question5.question: Do you offer furniture assembly services?
question5.answer: Yes, we offer assembly services for most of our furniture. You can select this option during the ordering process and our professional assembly team will take care of putting everything together at your home. Additional charges may apply depending on the complexity of assembly.

common.faqsubtitle: Everything you need to know about Decohome.
